price: 4 et à mettre en garde ceux qui prétendent qu’Allah s’est donné des enfants.
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
